name: werobot-admin
description: Administration interface of the werobot project
author: Thingmill <contact@thingmill.fr>

scripts.dev: cross-env API_ENDPOINT=http://localhost:8000 NODE_ENV=development nodemon server/index.js --watch server
scripts.deploy: git pull origin master && npm install && npm run build && cp .htaccess ./dist
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production API_ENDPOINT=https://api.werobot.fr PORT=3001 node server/index.js
